Package avrora.util.help

Interface Summary
HelpItem  
 

Class Summary
ClassMapValueItem The ClassMapValueItem is a help item representing one possible value for an option, where the value of the option is used to access a class map.
HelpCategory The HelpCategory class implements a category that provides help from the command line.
HelpSystem The HelpSystem is the global repository for help information, indexing categories for help, while each category can have sub categories, etc.
SubcategoryItem The SubcategoryItem class implements a help item that represents a subcategory in a help category.
ValueItem The ValueItem method represents a help item that is used in a list.
